item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, February 25, 2025 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:

2. Framework's first desktop is a strange–but unique–mini ITX gaming PC (193 points | 137 comments)

23. Embedding Python in Elixir, it's fine (217 points | 40 comments)

26. AI is blurring the line between PMs and engineers? (16 points | 19 comments)

28. Dogs may have domesticated themselves because they liked snacks, model suggests (94 points | 116 comments)
29. Show HN: Txtl – Fast static website of text utilities (35 points | 5 comments)
